    Jora Jobs Vacancies Procurement Executive

    December 2, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    Jora Jobs is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Procurement Executive position. If you currently looking for new job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    Kemajuan Arjaya Sdn Bhd
    Job Description:
    • Responsible for full spectrum of purchasing process, prepare Purchase Order and liaise with suppliers to ensure all products are supplied and delivered are in accordance to Purchase Order
    • Maintain lowest material cost by sourcing for new source, perform cost-down activities and conduct price comparison
    • To implement purchasing policies, procedures and best practices
    • Direct procurement policies to ensure all items are purchased and delivered within budget and time constraints
    • Identity and source new suppliers
    • Manage supplier process based on price, quality support capacity and reliability
    • Develop and maintain strategic relationships with key suppliers
    • Develop, negotiate and administer purchasing agreement and contracts with suppliers in support of organisation requirements
    • Facilitate timely placement of purchase orders
    • Prepare purchase orders for proper authorisation and compliance with organisational policy and procedures
    • Budgeting, costing and cost saving after reviewing the management information available
    • Liaise between suppliers, manufacturers, relevant internal department
    • Build and maintain good relationships with new and existing suppliers
    • Ensure purchase are in compliance with company standard policy and procedures
    • Keep a constant check on inventory level and prepare monthly report
    • Monthly checking all machineries and do necessary maintenance service
    • Continuously explores the processes to improve the quality of work and enhancing the purchasing work cycle
    • To proper filling documentation
    • Assumes any other duties that may assigned by Operation Division from time to time
    Requirement:
    • Candidate must possess at least a Diploma, or above in Business Administration, Management, Human Resource Management or equivalent work experience
    • Good team player with strong commitment and self-motivated
    • Good interpersonal, negotiation and communication skills, able to interact with project team, sub-contractor, and suppliers
    • Good initiative and positive attitude
    • Computer literate and skill (e.g MS office & Autocount)
    • Able to write/speak English/Malay/Mandarin is an advantage) in fluent
    • Can work independent
    • Willing to travel
    • Can accept more challenging work
    • License holder for Car and have own transport more advantage
    • No personal or contractual relationships with competitors

    Company Overview

    Who are we?
    Jora Malaysia is a search engine for jobs throughout Malaysia.
    Unlike traditional job boards, users can search through thousands of career opportunities, all sourced from many job sites from around Malaysia. 
    This Job Ad is one of the carefully selected pick from the clients of Jora Malaysia.
    Your application will be redirected to them.

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream job in Johor.
